Ahoy! I’m Andrew…

and that’s a picture of me
about to fall on my patootie.

I’m a student at Missouri University of Science and Technology in Rolla, Missouri. I’m passionate about usable software and typography. I’ve done work for Arthur Cramer Company in Naperville, Illinois and Softek Solutions, Inc. in Prairie Village, Kansas.

What to know more? Check me out around the web, or shoot me an email: andrew at dunkman dot org.
